result.eng: Your father will be in good health again before long.
result.ga: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh d'athair ina shláinte arís sul i bhfadYour father will be in good health again before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ d'aṫair ina ẛláinte arís sul i ḃfadYour father will be in good health again before long.

result.eng: It will be over before long.
result.ga: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfadIt will be over before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deireaḋ leis sul i ḃfadIt will be over before long.

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.orig: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís
result.html: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bád ag druidim isteaċ sa ċé agus sul i ḃfad ḃí siad ar ṫalaṁ tirim arísThe boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.

result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: Don't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ga: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.orig: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seo
result.html: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roimh an ainmfhocal sa chás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.
result.ponchtml: Ná cuirtear an t-alt roiṁ an ainmḟocal sa ċás seoDon't put an article before the noun in this case.

result.eng: She stood before me in the queue.
result.ga: Sheas sí romham sa scuaine
result.orig: Sheas sí romham sa scuaine
result.html: Sheas sí romham sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeas sí roṁam sa scuaineShe stood before me in the queue.

result.eng: Every mouthful is dunked in melted butter before it is eaten.
result.ga: Tumtar gach béalóg san im leáite sula n-itear é
result.orig: Tumtar gach béalóg san im leáite sula n-itear é
result.html: Tumtar gach béalóg san im leáite sula n-itear éEvery mouthful is dunked in melted butter before it is eaten.
result.ponchtml: Tumtar gaċ béalóg san im leáite sula n-itear éEvery mouthful is dunked in melted butter before it is eaten.

result.eng: I went to a play the night before last.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.orig: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréir
result.html: Chuaigh mé chuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ċuig dráma arú aréirI went to a play the night before last.

result.eng: Máire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ga: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.orig: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthi
result.html: Luigh Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular thit néal ar bith codlata uirthiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.
result.ponchtml: Luiġ Máire tamall fada ar a leaba sular ṫit néal ar biṫ codlata uirṫiMáire was lying on her bed for a long time before any sleep came.

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ga: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.orig: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.html: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ponchtml: sular ṫug siad aġaiḋ ar a dtiṫe murtallaċa sna bruaċḃailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.

result.eng: She came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ga: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.orig: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais Shóivéadaigh
result.html: Tháinig sí go Meiriceá roimh thitim an Aontais ShóivéadaighShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí go Meiriceá roiṁ ṫitim an Aontais ṠóivéadaiġShe came to America before the fall of the Soviet Union.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.html: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maithIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.orig: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.html: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar MheiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.html: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romhamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.

result.eng: It was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ga: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sé díreach roimh a naoi a chlog i Nua-EabhracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé díreaċ roiṁ a naoi a ċlog i Nua-EaḃracIt was just before nine o'clock in New York.

result.eng: Then, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ga: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.orig: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leis
result.html: Ansin nóiméad roimh a deich a chlog i Nua-Eabhrac tharla tubaiste nach raibh aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.
result.ponchtml: Ansin nóiméad roiṁ a deiċ a ċlog i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫarla tubaiste naċ raiḃ aon duine ag súil leisThen, one minute before ten o'clock in New York, a disaster happened that nobody expected.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: It wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chine
result.html: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh daoine geala ag breathnú ar dhaoine gorma mar fho-chineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ daoine geala ag breaṫnú ar ḋaoine gorma mar ḟo-ċineIt wasn't long before white people started looking at black people as a sub-race.

result.eng: Before them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ga: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.orig: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompu
result.html: Baile beag suarach ocrach beadaí a bhí amach rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.
result.ponchtml: Baile beag suaraċ ocraċ beadaí a ḃí amaċ rompuBefore them lay a tiny, shabby, hungry town.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
